#Overview Description: 

apche 1.3 configuration crashes PC builds on working with PHP 4.4.9 and mySQL 5.0.51a server.

#Steps to Reproduce:  

1) install php and mySQL
2) configure php_config.ini and point alias path variable to that of apche's config file.
3) run php script from apache server

#Actual Results: 

The application crashed. displayed "Windows Explorer has encountered a problem and needs to be closed"

#build on PC running on WindowsXP (SP2) 

 - Occurs On
        Internet Explorer 6.0
        Mozila Firefox3.0.1
creator: 6135285@swin.edu.au

1. This sounds like a php problem. So this is the wrong bugzilla here.
2. Especially on Windows you shouldn't use httpd 1.3 any longer. Please upgrade to the latest version.
